data.title: SONGWRITER RON E. & FABOLOUS DROPS NEW SINGLE “WORST WAY” – MNRK Music Group
data.meta_description:
PREMIERES NEW VIDEO ON BET JAMS & BET SOUL


July 23, 2024 – Rising music sensation Ron E., the protégé of multi-Grammy Award-winning producer Hi...
data.text:
PREMIERES NEW VIDEO ON BET JAMS & BET SOUL

July 23, 2024 – Rising music sensation Ron E., the protégé of multi-Grammy Award-winning producer Hitmaka, is set to release his highly anticipated new single “Worst Way” with iconic rapper Fabolous via Makasound/MNRK Music Group. Produced by Hitmaka, “Worst Way” sets the stage for a sexy and steamy summer love. The single captures the essence of a classic R&B hit with rapper Fabolous adding his cool touch with rhymes like, “She know how to throw it back and it ain’t even Thursday…,” while Ron croons, “Like it’s your birthday, act bad, wanna see you in the worst way…”. “Worst Way” is the debut single from Ron E.’s forthcoming EP, set for release this fall.

CLICK HERE TO STREAM “WORST WAY”

The accompanying video, which premiered on BET Jams & BET Soul, was shot by director Gerard Victor (known for his work with JT, Sexyy Red, Lil Durk, Conway, and more), showcases an enchanting Harlem love story featuring Ron and his leading lady from the corner store to the stoop.
